root.name: Overlord Minions
root.description: OverviewOverlord Minions was announced at the 2008 Games Convention. OverviewThis time around the Overlord controls a team of elite minions, assisted by Gnarl. The player will make use of the Nintendo DS touch screen and use of the stylus. The player will control a group of four minions and solve puzzles in this action puzzle game for the Nintendo DS.
